coursework: Analysis of Data Structures and Algorithms

projects.name: Neuro Nudge: AI Precision Cursor
projects.description: Utilizes hand gestures for PC control, overcomes issues of physical mice: Eliminates need for special hardware, adapts to diverse environments, and avoids lifespan limitations of wired and wireless variants.

projects.name: Auto Image Captioning
projects.description: The objective of the project is to predict the captions for the input image. The dataset consists of 8k images and 5 captions for each image. CNN is used for image and LSTM is used for text. BLEU Score is used as a metric to evaluate the performance of the trained model.

projects.name: Student Attendance System Using Face Detection
projects.description: Attendance System Created using haar cascade designed by OpenCV to detect the frontal face and then store the faces of students after detection. Then using facial recognition to mark attendance of those students whose face have been identified in a excel sheet.

publications.title: Smart Agri-Advisor: Integrating Chatbot Technology with CNN-Based Crop Disease Classification for Enhanced Agricultural Decision-Making
publications.authors: Ratna Patil, Yogita Sinkar, Ashish Ruke, Harshvardhan Kulkarni, Om Kadam
publications.journal: International Journal of Engineering Trends and Technology
